titleStmt.title: Hymnes and spiritual songs extracted from Scripture on occasion of some useful texts discuss't / composed in private meditation and made use of (once) in publick for the saints comfort ; now published for their sakes that sung them or others that desire them.
titleStmt.author: Reeve, John, 1608-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
